title: Designing Success Strategies for University Professional Learners Using Learning Analytics

context.prior_knowledge: Basic scientific knowledge and fundamental mobile device utilization skills
context.additional_context: Application of personalized teaching methods using learning analytics tools in a smartphone-based microlearning environment for entry-level professionals in medical, legal, and technical fields

learning_goals: Interpret learning analytics data to identify individual learning patterns with 80% accuracy
Design three or more personalized feedback strategies based on analysis results
Propose process improvement plans utilizing learning data collected in mobile environments

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
